news.title: IREEM Completes Energy Auditor Training Batch 15
news.excerpt: Another cohort of 45 energy professionals successfully certified through our comprehensive training program in partnership with the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources.

news.title: National MRV Platform Launch Ceremony
news.excerpt: IREEM celebrates the official launch of the national energy efficiency MRV platform, a milestone in Indonesia's climate commitment tracking.

news.title: New Partnership Announcement with Development Agency
news.excerpt: IREEM enters strategic partnership to expand capacity building programs across five new provinces.

news.title: New Guidebook Released: Energy Audit Best Practices
news.excerpt: Our latest publication provides comprehensive guidance for investment-grade energy audits tailored to Indonesian context.
